components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
While testing our Titanium app on Android devices using AdBlockPlus app we experienced that sending requests (using Ti.Network.createHTTPClient) sometimes raise http errors, such as :
- org.apache.http.NoHttpResponseException: The target server failed to respond
- java.net.SocketTimeoutException: Read timed out

You will find more traces in the attachement text file.
fields.summary: Ramdom HTTP errors with the AdBlockPlus app running in background
fields.environment:
Android 4.1.2
Samsung Galaxy S3 (GT-I9300)
AdBlockPlus running in background

comments.body: Closing, assuming same resolution as TC-2109.
